modules.name: SubMixer
modules.description: 4 Channel stereo mixer with pan based on fundametal VCMixer

modules.name: Mults
modules.description: Simple 2*5 Multiples

modules.name: Mixer
modules.description: 12 Channel Mixer with 2 auxiliary sends and returns and channel mutes.

modules.name: Wave Folder
modules.description: Simple Waver Folder

modules.name: Gates
modules.description: Manual or remotely controllable gates

modules.name: Clipper
modules.description: Simple Clipping distortion

modules.name: A/B Switches
modules.description: A/B Switches

modules.name: Quantiser
modules.description: Takes inputs pitchs and quantises to scale selected by buttons for each pitch

modules.name: Chord
modules.description: Inspired by Q-Bit chord Eurorack module, takes input pitch and builds a chord

modules.name: Muxes
modules.description: 2 * 2 into 1 muxes and 1 4 into 1 mux

modules.name: Logic
modules.description: Various logic gates

modules.name: Buttons
modules.description: Buttons for controlling other modules manually 7 On/off switches in the top section and 7 momentary buttons in the lower.

modules.name: Sums
modules.description: 2 * 5 into 1 summing mixers, useful for adding cvs for pitch and modulation

modules.name: Pitch Shifter
modules.description: Shift pitches by octaves or semitones

modules.name: Clock Divider
modules.description: Based on autodafe's clock divider but I've simplified the code, made the gui smaller and added extra divisions 3, 5, 7 and 12

modules.name: Cartesian Sequencer
modules.description: Cartesian sequencer similar to make noise rene.

modules.name: Patch Matrix
modules.description: 10 by 10 Patch matrix

modules.name: Binary decoder
modules.description: 3 bit binary decoder true at one of 8 outputs dependent on logic state of the 3 inputs

modules.name: 8 way switch
modules.description: based on binary decoder, switches a signal to one of 8 outputs based on 3 bit selector inputs

modules.name: 8 to 1 Mux
modules.description: The reverse of the 8 way switch, 8 inputs 1 out selected with 3 logic inputs

modules.name: Dual Counters
modules.description: for euclidean rhythms

modules.name: Knobs
modules.description: Outputs constants continous or stepped by integer ro semitone, uni or bipolar

modules.name: Gate Maker
modules.description: Counter with delay before opening and after closing, cycle or one shot mode - BETA

modules.name: Master Clock
modules.description: Set a Tempo by BPM and time signature, outputs beat, bar and subdivisions of the beat

modules.name: Quad LFO
modules.description: 4 LFOs with cv control and 4 synced modes in a small panel
